Megastorm:
     "Done," He said, turning and running, he transformed into Vehicle mode as he did, and tore off across the terrain, blasting anything that got in his way.
(BTW: He looks like Armada's Megatron toy, not the cartoon)
 aerosmith60@... wrote:Galvatron sent back a comm. "I have a good idea im fighting him now if you wish to help lock on to my coordinates and follow"
